languages.text: {n}Криво улыбаясь, Владайм поправляет вас:{/n} "Богомерзких смутьянов, презревших закон и угрожающих безопасности станции. Прошу именовать нас полным титулом".
{n}With a wry smile, Vladaym corrects you:{/n} "Ungodly, lawless rabble-rousers who are a threat to the security of this station. Kindly refer to us using our full titles, please."
languages.original_text: {n}Криво улыбаясь, Владайм поправляет вас:{/n} "Богомерзких смутьянов, презревших закон и угрожающих безопасности станции. Прошу именовать нас полным титулом".

traits.locale_text: {n}With a wry smile, Vladaym corrects you.{/n} "Ungodly, lawless rabble-rousers who are a threat to the security of this station. Kindly refer to us using our full titles."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆狡黠一笑，纠正道。{/n}“是目无法纪、无法无天的暴乱分子，此刻正在威胁这座星站的安全。请用我们的全称来称呼我们，拜托了，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}With a wry smile, Vladaym corrects you:{/n} "Ungodly, lawless rabble-rousers who are a threat to the security of this station. Kindly refer to us using our full titles, please."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆狡黠一笑，纠正道。{/n}“是目无法纪、无法无天的暴乱分子，此刻正在威胁这座星站的安全。请用我们的全称来称呼我们，大人。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}皮肉っぽい笑顔を浮かべ、ヴラダイムは訂正する。{/n}「当ステーションの安全を脅かす、神をも恐れぬ無法者たちよ。私達の事は、敬称を付けて呼びなさい」
languages.original_text: {n}With a wry smile, Vladaym corrects you:{/n} "Ungodly, lawless rabble-rousers who are a threat to the security of this station. Kindly refer to us using our full titles, please."

traits.locale_text: {n}皮肉っぽい笑顔を浮かべ、ヴラダイムは訂正する。{/n}「当ステーションの安全を脅かす、神をも恐れぬ無法者たちよ。私達の事は、敬称を付けて呼びなさい」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Con una sonrisa irónica, Vladaym te corrige.{/n} «Agitadores impíos y sin ley que son una amenaza para la seguridad de esta estación. Por favor, refiérase a nosotros con nuestros títulos completos».
languages.original_text: {n}With a wry smile, Vladaym corrects you:{/n} "Ungodly, lawless rabble-rousers who are a threat to the security of this station. Kindly refer to us using our full titles, please."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una sonrisa irónica, Vladaym te corrige.{/n} «Agitadores impíos y sin ley que son una amenaza para la seguridad de esta estación. Por favor, refiérase a nosotros con nuestros títulos completos».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym korrigiert dich mit einem trockenen Lächeln.{/n} "Gottlose, gesetzlose Unruhestifter, die eine Gefahr für die Sicherheit dieser Station darstellen. Bitte sprecht uns mit unseren vollen Titeln an."
languages.original_text: {n}With a wry smile, Vladaym corrects you:{/n} "Ungodly, lawless rabble-rousers who are a threat to the security of this station. Kindly refer to us using our full titles, please."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym korrigiert dich mit einem trockenen Lächeln.{/n} "Gottlose, gesetzlose Unruhestifter, die eine Gefahr für die Sicherheit dieser Station darstellen. Bitte sprecht uns mit unseren vollen Titeln an."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Avec un sourire en coin, Vladaym vous corrige :{/n} « Plutôt des fauteurs de troubles sans foi ni loi qui menacent la sécurité de cette station. Veuillez utiliser nos titres complets quand vous vous adressez à nous. »
languages.original_text: {n}With a wry smile, Vladaym corrects you:{/n} "Ungodly, lawless rabble-rousers who are a threat to the security of this station. Kindly refer to us using our full titles, please."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un sourire en coin, Vladaym vous corrige :{/n} « Plutôt des fauteurs de troubles sans foi ni loi qui menacent la sécurité de cette station. Merci d'utiliser nos titres au complet quand vous vous adressez à nous. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Vladaym, alaycı sırıtışıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "İlah tanımaz, kanun bilmez serseriler. İstasyonumuzun güvenliğine tehdit teşkil ediyorlar. Hitabetiniz muntazam ve noksansız olursa sevinirim."
languages.original_text: {n}With a wry smile, Vladaym corrects you:{/n} "Ungodly, lawless rabble-rousers who are a threat to the security of this station. Kindly refer to us using our full titles, please."

traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
